henderson.background: Former factory foreman. Oldest man in the platoon.

malone.background: Ex-boxer, built like a fire hydrant. Leads from the front.

park.background: Korean-American, had to fight twice as hard for his rank. Quiet, methodical, deadly.

rivera.background: Wanted to be a doctor. Gentle hands, steel nerves under fire.

kowalski.background: Polish-American, built like an ox. Carries the BAR like other men carry rifles.

davis.background: Former telegraph operator. Funny, keeps the men laughing. Carries 30 pounds of radio without complaining.

doyle.background: Farm kid, youngest in the platoon. Eager, scared, trying to prove himself.

webb.background: Smooth talker, always has a cigarette. Looks lazy but has the best eyes in the platoon.

ellis.background: Nervous, intellectual, reads books in his foxhole. Joined because he felt he had to.

washington.background: Street-smart, tough, grew up hard. Doesn't scare easy.

caruso.background: Loud, brash, talks constantly. Drives the sergeants crazy but the privates love him.

mitchell.background: Quiet, polite, writes letters to his mother every day. Dead shot with a rifle.

novak.background: 6'4", former steelworker. Carries ammunition for Kowalski. Simple, dependable, strong as an ox.

sullivan.background: Irish-Catholic, prays before every mission. Superstitious but dependable.

bergman.background: German-American, sensitive about it. Speaks some German, which could be useful.

jenkins.background: Former hunting guide. Knows the outdoors better than anyone. Excellent tracker.

herrera.background: Fast runner, former track star. Skinny, wiry, never stops moving.

palmer.background: The complainer. Bitches about everything. But when the bullets fly, he fights.
